refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: DH_new() allocates and initializes a DH structure.
DH_free() frees the DH structure and its components. The values are erased before the memory is returned to the system.

refsection.title: RETURN VALUES
refsection.para: If the allocation fails, DH_new() returns NULL and sets an error code that can be obtained by ERR_get_error(3). Otherwise it returns a pointer to the newly allocated structure.

refsection.title: HISTORY
refsection.para: DH_new() and DH_free() are available in all versions of SSLeay and OpenSSL.
